title: Hailey Bieber
summary: Hailey Rhode Bieber (n√©e Baldwin; born November 22, 1996) is an American model, media personality, and socialite.[3]  She has been featured in major ads for Guess, Ralph Lauren, and Tommy Hilfiger.[4] Bieber is a daughter of Stephen Baldwin and niece of Alec, Daniel and William Baldwin. She is married to Canadian singer Justin Bieber.[5][6]
